titles.title: Unemployment-Based Immigration Adjustment Act of 1993
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the adjustment of levels of immigration to reflect changes in the unemployment rate of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Unemployment-Based Immigration Adjustment Act of 1993 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to adjust annual immigration levels in inverse relation to U.S. unemployment levels.
